plan_state.explanation: Set up a concrete sequence: add controls, make ObservedObject cross-platform, update docs, and validate compilation.

plan.step: Explore repo and identify parity gaps

Provide ObservedObject support on Linux via OpenCombine compat

Update feature-parity.md to reflect new implementations

Attempt a local build to sanity-check compilation
